content: UD 16 Drill driver Corded two-speed, high-torque drill driver for wood applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Drill drivers and screwdrivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ergonomically designed pistol grip and low weight for maximum comfort during long periods of use Very reliable thanks to the extremely rugged casing and robust motor Stepless electronic speed control for smooth, gentle starting and screwdriving Features two gears – first gear for high torque, second gear for high speed Choice of keyless chuck with spindle lock or robust key chuck Applications Drilling in steel and sheet metal Drilling in wood with auger bits, paddle bits and Forstner bits Various screwdriving jobs Use of hole saws (up to 68 mm dia.) Driving large-diameter wood screws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Chuck clamping range: 1/16 - 1/2 in No load RPM: gear 1: 900 rpm; gear 2: 2500 rpm Maximum torque (Soft / Hard Joint): 708 in-lb (soft joint) Technical Data | Chuck clamping range | 1/16 - 1/2 in | No load RPM | gear 1: 900 rpm; gear 2: 2500 rpm | Maximum torque (Soft / Hard Joint) | 708 in-lb (soft joint) | Number of gears | 2 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 13.5 x 3.4 x 8.1 in | Weight | 5.73 lb | Triaxial vibration value for drilling into metal (ah,D) | 2.5 m/s² | 1 | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 273749 - Universal wood drill keyed UD 16 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x UD 16 120V USA ZKR Drill - 273752 - Universal wood drill keyless UD 16 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x UD 16 120V USA Drill
